column2: aerial drone companion device is autonomously oriented such that an image capture device faces the first user in response to detecting the first voice command . a second voice command is detected while the image captured device faces a first user . the task signal is transmitted by the computer based on the second voice commands .
column3: when i say "hello" chatbot should say "hi"
